Hello,

Is there any validation framework that we can use for both Silverlight and WPF? When I was developing WPF project, I used to use theValidation Application Block. but that framework doesn't work with Silverlight.

Hi

 

The Reference Implementation of the latest Prism-v2 drop (drop 8) implements a validation approach that you might find useful. The following post by Bob Brumfield gives a more detailed information about this:

·         Prism V2 – Drop 8 Available

 

Please let me know if this helps.

 

Damian Schenkelman

http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman

Actually, I found this example but it would be great if we can use the attribute-based the validation. As we are already familiar with Validation Application Block, it will be really helpful for us.

Anyway, if there is no other option, I will look the validation provided by Prism v2 drop 8. Where can I get more examples about that validation? How can I do the cross-field validation? For example: If a property "A" is something then another property "B" shouldn't be that thing=.
